Text: WATCH OUT !  FORD WAS TAKEN TO COURT FOR THIS BOOK, MADE AN ASS OF HIMSELF DISPLAYING HIS ENORMOUS IGNORANCE OF ALMOST EVERYTHING, STILL NEO-NAZIS USE THIS CRAP TO CONVINCE IDIOTS.

Worse than the Edsel? 

OTOH, read it and see why Ford sponsored Schindler's List without commercial interruption a few years ago. Henry was long dead. I don't see why the stockholders had to underwrite that maudlin piece of shit.
IGNORANT NEO-NAZIS, THERE ARE MANY JEWS LIVING IN GERMANY NOW, A GREAT COUNTRY BECAUSE IT REPUDIATED NAZISM... GET A LIFE, SORRY MAGGOTS....

Yes, racist Germany continues to support racist Israel. Google Transfer Agreement or Haavara Agreement to read about the 1930s collaboration between the Zionists and the Nazis. It is all in the history books. The truth cannot be antisemitic.

I READ THIS BOOK, IT IS BASED ON THE ZION PROTOCOLS FORGERY THAT THE US SENATE PROVED TO BE A RUSSIAN FAKE TO SLANDER JEWS. FORD RECEIVED A MEDAL FROM HITLER, THEN TRIED TO HIDE HIS NAZI VIEWS BUT ON THE SLY KEPT NAZIS WORKING IN HIS PUBLICATIONS, A REAL PIECE OF WORK OLD MAN FORD, PITY HE DIDN´T STICK TO THE ONLY THING HE KNEW: MAKING CHEAP CARS.

Get over yourself. It is what is called history. No one in history held the sublime ideals of the criminal squatters in Jerusalem and the West Bank and in Syria. Ford did not bomb the King David Hotel nor conduct the massacres at Deir Yassin and a dozen other places nor expel 750,000 Palestinians and steal their land, homes and all other personal property they could not carry with them into exile. 
Israel vindicates the Protocols, forged or not. Newsflash for you. Anyone who thought they ever thought they were real probably hopes to meet Captain America some day. 
Anti-zionism is a moral imperative.

ONE THING IS ANTI-ZIONISM, WHICH I SHARE AS REJECTION OF THE IMPERIALIST ACTIONS OF THE STATE OF ISRAEL, AND QUITE ANOTHER THE FANATIC AND IRRATIONAL ANTI-JUDAISM OF THE NEO-NAZIS. MANY JEWS ARE ALSO AGAINST ISRAEL'S POLICIES AND OPENLY SAY SO, EVEN GOING TO MEET PALESTINIAN LEADERS.... FORD WAS A GUY WITH NAZI INCLINATIONS AND A FANATIC ANTI-JEW, LIKE HIS NAZI FRIENDS.

Yes I am certain there are some Jews who reject the idea of Israel entirely. After all there were Germans who rejected the ideals of Nazi Germany. That does nothing to repair the image of the vast majority of Jews who do in fact support Israel. Israel validates the protocols. Anti-zionism is a moral imperative. Racist Israel must cease to exist as racist South Africa ceased to exist. There is no excuse for another moment's delay in its destruction with speedy trials and slow executions for its political leaders. 

Save for the rare and "self-hating" Jews there is no difference or distinction between Judaism and Zionism. 

There is no cause to condemn Ford without first condemning the Jewish terrorists of history such as most of Israel's prime ministers. 

There is no rationalization to condemn anyone who does not separate Israel from Jews because Israel claims to speak for all the Jews and there is no Jewish condemnation of that claim save for a few self-haters on the fringe.

If Jews want to condemn Henry Ford they need first remove the beam from their own eye with unanimous condemnation of the horrors of Zionism and apologies to its millions of victims.

By definition ALL Zionists are murderers and thieves -- and they are proud of it.

SOME ANTI-ZIONSTS ARE REALLY NEO-NAZI JEW HATERS WHO USE ISRAEL´S POLICIES TO ATTACK ALL JEWS. THEY DON´T FOOL ANYONE EXCEPT IDIOTS... FORD WAS IN FACT PUT ON TRIAL FOR THIS AND HE LOST, REVEALING IN CROSS EXAMINATION HIS IGNORANCE OF THE SUBJECT AND EVEN OF BASIC HISTORICAL FACTS.

Please try to get over yourself. If would have been a sad day for freedom of the press in the US IF Ford had been put on trial for it. But he was NOT. 

Jews have hated Christians from the beginning when they tried to exterminate all Christians. Seems to me like a classic reason for the caution, Don't start a fight you can't finish. 

They started it. And after centuries of good relations with Islam they started hating Muslims too. They hate Muslims simply for trying reclaim what is theirs. 

The actions of Jews in Palestine exonerates the protocols. The support of Israel by Jews exonerates the protocols. 

What is it you don't get about Jews ruling the world? Have you never read the Old Testament? All the nations will bow to Israel. It is not as though the Protocols is anything but derivative of the Bible. If you want to throw in the Bolshevik part they openly said they were trying to rule the world. 

What part of "Jews don't like it so it must be antisemitic" don't you get?
